name: Curious Fixation: An Infinite Runner
description:
Update:

To early Windows users who were prompted with an error message on launch requesting a missing file named UnityPlayer.dll, that file is now available separately and the original download link has been amended to include this file now. UnityPlayer.dll should be in the same directory as the game executable when attempting to launch the game.

Background:

A game with no end condition as we unfortunately ran out of time!

Loosely based on the sandstorm scene from Mad Max: Fury Road. Avoid enemy vehicles while navigating the Wasteland.

Controls:

W - Accelerate
A - Steer Left
D - Steer Right
S - Decelerate

Credits:

Scripts, Particle Setup by Mark Videon
Textures and Meshes by Peter Cowen

Find Peter on Artstation here.

Daylight skybox from the Skybox Free Series on the Unity Asset store.

Sounds sourced from Freesound.org:

Collision: https://freesound.org/people/ShawnyBoy/sounds/166191/
Motor: https://freesound.org/people/debsound/sounds/278186/
Wind: https://freesound.org/people/Bengalboss25/sounds/262243/
Thunder: https://freesound.org/people/vonz/sounds/188767/
